summary.purpose: Global React hooks for document title management and user country/language initialization via IP geolocation.
summary.problem_solved: Provides reusable hooks for setting page titles dynamically and detecting user location with optional language switching.

exports.name: useDocumentTitle
exports.description_one_line: Hook to set browser document title dynamically.

exports.name: useSetUserCountry
exports.description_one_line: Hook to detect user country and optionally set language.

params.name: title
params.description: Page title to display in browser tab

details.what_it_does: Uses useEffect to set document.title whenever title prop changes. Cleanup is automatic on unmount.

minimal_correct.title: Set page title

symbols.name: useSetUserCountry
symbols.description_one_line: Detect user country and set language.

details.what_it_does: Uses useLayoutEffect to call getUserCountryByIp, stores in localStorage, optionally calls changLang if no saved language preference. Sets country via dispatch.

minimal_correct.title: Initialize user country and language
